arStrings.szText: "I found another piece of the broken totem on a dead body."
Perhaps the body was one of those that I sent out to search for the fragments too...I must regretfully hope for that. To think that another might hold it is terrifying.
This part fits onto the first bit that you brought me. I believe it is the carving of a bear. Even though we are still missing the head, the shape of the legs and body are clear enough.
We cannot risk that a bear totem be used with ill intent, not with all that we have already seen.
Perhaps if you are to find the last piece, you should hunt the bears themselves. Using only part of a totem could have caused a flawed transformation.
